hero.title: Practice smart. Trade smarter.
hero.description:
Want to think and decide like a professional trader in the US stock market, but don't want to risk real money right away?

Stock AI Quant Lab is an AI-powered stock trading simulator designed for everyday US investors. Practice and validate your strategies in a real market environment with AI assistance before considering real capital.

introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: Think Like a Quant, But Zero Barriers to Entry
introduce.label: AI-Powered
introduce.description: Most 'trading simulators' just let you buy and sell without understanding the strategy behind it. Stock AI Quant Lab uses AI to translate complex quantitative thinking into rules you can understand and test.

items.title: Natural Language Strategies
items.description: Just describe your trading idea in plain English: 'I want to hold tech blue chips long-term' or 'I want to trade high-volatility tech stocks short-term.' AI converts it into quantitative rules: entry conditions, exit rules, risk controls.

items.title: No Coding Required
items.description: You don't need to code or understand advanced math. AI handles professional concepts like moving averages, support levels, stop-loss settings, and position sizing for you.

items.title: Professional-Grade Logic
items.description: Get quantitative-level strategy testing capabilities, but presented in a simple, understandable way that you can actually use.

benefit.name: benefit
benefit.title: Rehearse Your Ideas on Historical Data
benefit.label: Backtesting
benefit.description: Before putting real money on the line, you can see how your rules might have performed in past markets using the simulator.

items.title: Test on Real Stocks
items.description: Run historical simulations on specific stocks (like AAPL, TSLA, popular US ETFs) to see how your strategy might have performed.

items.title: Multiple Market Conditions
items.description: See hypothetical performance across different market environments: bull markets, bear markets, sideways markets. Understand your strategy's strengths and weaknesses.

items.title: Clear Performance Metrics
items.description: View key metrics clearly: win rate, maximum drawdown, return curve, volatility. Turn 'gut feeling' into 'data-informed decisions.'

usage.name: usage
usage.title: AI as Your Trading Coach, Not a Black Box
usage.description: Many people hear 'AI' and 'quant' and think it's abstract and hard to understand. In Stock AI Quant Lab, AI is more like a patient trading coach.

items.title: Simple Explanations
items.description: AI explains in simple language: why a strategy might perform worse in choppy markets, which period had larger drawdowns, and what might have caused them.

items.title: Optimization Suggestions
items.description: AI suggests how to optimize: whether you need stricter stop-losses, should reduce concentration in a single sector, or need to extend/shorten holding periods.

items.title: Stories Behind the Numbers
items.description: You see not just numbers, but the 'stories and logic behind them,' helping you truly understand your strategy's performance.

feature.name: feature
feature.title: Designed for US Investors
feature.label: Who It's For
feature.description: Whether you're a beginner or an experienced trader, Stock AI Quant Lab helps you practice and improve.

items.title: For Beginners
items.description: New to trading? Start with pre-built AI strategy templates. Learn the basics of quantitative thinking without risking real money.

items.title: For Advancing Traders
items.description: Already trading? Test your strategies on historical data to see how they might have performed in different market conditions.

items.title: For Curious Learners
items.description: Want to understand how professional traders think? AI breaks down complex strategies into simple, understandable concepts.

items.title: For Busy Professionals
items.description: Limited time? Test your trading ideas during lunch breaks. AI handles the complex analysis for you.

items.title: Easy to Understand
items.description: No jargon, no black boxes. Everything is explained in plain English so you can make informed decisions.

items.title: Virtual Account Practice
items.description: Practice discipline and risk management in a virtual account. Learn from mistakes without financial consequences.

stats.name: stats
stats.title: Practice Makes Perfect
stats.description: Join thousands of investors practicing smart trading strategies.

items.description: US Stocks & Crypto

testimonial.name: testimonial
testimonial.title: Who Uses Stock AI Quant Lab
testimonial.description: Real scenarios from everyday investors like you.

items.title: Sarah Chen
items.label: New Investor
items.description: Before investing real money, I practiced for 3 months with Stock AI Quant Lab. I learned how to set stop-losses and control position sizes. Now I feel much more confident.

items.title: Mike Johnson
items.label: Busy Professional
items.description: I can test my trading ideas during lunch breaks. AI helps me turn vague intuitions into verifiable strategies. It's perfect for my schedule.

items.title: David Martinez
items.label: Advancing Trader
items.description: I use it to backtest my strategies across different market environments. The data-driven analysis gives me more confidence in my approach.

items.title: Emily Wang
items.label: Tech Professional
items.description: I was curious about quantitative trading but didn't know where to start. The natural language interface made it so easy to get started without coding.

items.title: James Rodriguez
items.label: Part-time Trader

items.title: Lisa Thompson
items.label: Risk-Averse Investor

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us via email.

items.title: Do I need to know how to code?
items.description: No! Stock AI Quant Lab is designed for non-programmers. You describe your trading ideas in plain English, and AI translates them into quantitative rules. No coding or advanced math required.

items.title: Is this real trading?
items.description: No, this is a simulator using virtual funds. You practice with zero financial risk. It's designed to help you build skills and confidence before trading with real money.

items.title: What markets and assets are supported?
items.description: We support 500+ US stocks (including popular names like AAPL, TSLA, NVDA) and major cryptocurrencies. You can test strategies on individual stocks or ETFs.

items.title: How does the AI help me?
items.description: AI acts as your trading coach. It converts your natural language ideas into strategies, explains performance in simple terms, and suggests optimizations like adjusting stop-losses or reducing sector concentration.

items.title: Can I test my strategy on historical data?
items.description: Yes! You can backtest your strategies on historical market data to see how they might have performed in bull markets, bear markets, and sideways markets. This helps you understand strengths and weaknesses before going live.

items.title: How long does it take to get started?
items.description: You can start practicing in about 5 minutes. Sign up, choose a pre-built AI strategy template or describe your own idea, and begin simulated trading immediately.

items.title: Is my data secure?
items.description: Yes. We use industry-standard encryption and secure databases (Supabase) to protect your information. Since this is a simulator, no real financial accounts or sensitive banking information is involved.

items.title: Do I need to download anything?
items.description: No downloads required. Stock AI Quant Lab is a web-based platform. Access it from any modern browser on your computer, tablet, or phone.

cta.name: cta
cta.title: Start Practicing Today
cta.description: Practice smart in the simulator. Trade smarter with real capital later.
